summary: In one long Friday evening, Takeshi Miyata, a straight-arrow businessman, will encounter a number of people (some only fleetingly) who have intertwining fates. After six months he is still ... See full summary »
cast: Yasuhi Nakamura|Reika Kirishima|So Yamanaka|Yuka Itaya|Kisuke Yamashita|Kanehiro Ri
title: Unmei janai hito
